component.name: SoundCloud Desktop
component.summary: Unofficial SoundCloud desktop client with ad-blocking

description.p: SoundCloud Desktop is the best unofficial SoundCloud desktop application for Windows, Linux & macOS with built-in ad-blocking, geo-unblocking, and proxy support.

ul.li: Native Desktop Experience - Full-featured SoundCloud desktop client
Beautiful Dark Theme - Eye-friendly interface for music lovers
Access Anywhere - Bypass geographical restrictions and geo-blocking
Zero Ads - Built-in ad blocker for uninterrupted music streaming
Lightning Fast - Optimized TypeScript codebase, faster than web version
Privacy Focused - Proxy support for secure and private listening
Cross-Platform - Works on Windows 10/11, Linux, and macOS
Lightweight - Small footprint, minimal system resources
